29#include "file.h"
30
31#ifndef lint
32#if 0
33FILE_RCSID("@(#)$File: buffer.c,v 1.6 2019/05/07 02:27:11 christos Exp $")
34#else
35__RCSID("$NetBSD: buffer.c,v 1.1.1.2 2019/05/22 17:19:56 christos Exp $");
36#endif
37#endif /* lint */
38
39#include "magic.h"
40#include <unistd.h>
41#include <string.h>
42#include <stdlib.h>
43#include <sys/stat.h>
44
45void
46buffer_init(struct buffer *b, int fd, const struct stat *st, const void *data,
47 size_t len)
48{
49 b->fd = fd;
50 if (st)
51 memcpy(&b->st, st, sizeof(b->st));
52 else if (b->fd == -1 || fstat(b->fd, &b->st) == -1)
53 memset(&b->st, 0, sizeof(b->st));
54 b->fbuf = data;
55 b->flen = len;
56 b->eoff = 0;
57 b->ebuf = NULL;
58 b->elen = 0;
59}
60
61void
62buffer_fini(struct buffer *b)
63{
64 free(b->ebuf);
65}
66
67int
68buffer_fill(const struct buffer *bb)
69{
70 struct buffer *b = CCAST(struct buffer *, bb);
71
72 if (b->elen != 0)
73 return b->elen == CAST(size_t, ~0) ? -1 : 0;
74
75 if (!S_ISREG(b->st.st_mode))
76 goto out;
77
78 b->elen = CAST(size_t, b->st.st_size) < b->flen ?
79 CAST(size_t, b->st.st_size) : b->flen;
80 if ((b->ebuf = malloc(b->elen)) == NULL)
81 goto out;
82
83 b->eoff = b->st.st_size - b->elen;
84 if (pread(b->fd, b->ebuf, b->elen, b->eoff) == -1) {
85 free(b->ebuf);
86 goto out;
87 }
88
89 return 0;
90out:
91 b->elen = CAST(size_t, ~0);
92 return -1;
93}
94
